title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Greg Olsen on Russ Trade, Mike Missanelli on Harden Embiid Duo, Hurts Future & Best March Madness Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Greg Olsen on Russ Trade, Mike Missanelli on Harden Embiid Duo, Hurts Future & Best March Madness Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of the Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week (3:00), including why the Seahawks trading Russell Wilson is the latest sign of an organization in decline, what Aaron Rodgers' decision to stay in Green Bay says about his priorities, what Coach K and Michael Jordan have in common, and the biggest lesson NFL teams should learn from the Cowboys having to cut Amari Cooper.

First, Fox NFL Analyst and 14-year NFL tight end Greg Olsen (21:00) on why the Broncos are everything Russell Wilson was looking for, why Greg was unimpressed with Seattle's offensive scheme during his season with the team, and when he realized Wilson was different than any QB he had ever player with.

Then, Philly sports talk host Mike Missanelli (31:00) explains why Philly is already buying into the James Harden/Joel Embiid duo, the biggest factor in Ben Simmons and the Sixers ugly divorce, if the Eagles are going to build around Jalen Hurts or pursue a top available QB and how the Eagles will approach the upcoming NFL Draft .

Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman (48:00) tells Colin if he's sharp or square with his NCAA Tourney title pick, and which teams the sharps like!

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
